get.description: Additional searches: validationFields[Name]=true and dataFields[Name]=true. These can be used to search for authorization code definitions that have the specified data or validation fields.

parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Optional. The page offset.  If not specified, the default page offset is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Optional. If specified, filters definitions by name. Starting and ending wildcards (*) supported.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Optional. If specified, filters definitions to those created by the given User ID.
parameters.name: createdByUserID

parameters.description: Optional. If specified, filters definitions to those deleted by the given User ID.
parameters.name: deletedByUserID

parameters.description: Optional. Whether to include deleted definitions. 'False' by default.
parameters.name: includeDeleted

parameters.description: Optional. If specified, filters definitions with the designated categoryID.
parameters.name: categoryID

items.description: Represents the model used to define how a type of authorization code is generated.

AuthorizationID.description: The value used for securing codes generated.

CreatedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that created this definition. Read only.

CreatedDate.description: A timestamp of when this definition was created. Read only.

DataFields.description: The defined fields to include in authorization codes generated from this definition. May not be updated.

DigitsPrecision.description: The number of decimal digits to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. Must be in range 1 - 15.

MaxExponent.description: The maximum exponent to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. May not be greater than 307.

MaxValue.description: The maximum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

MinExponent.description: The minimum exponent to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. May not be less than -292.

MinValue.description: The minimum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

ScaleFactor.description: The resolution of values that can be represented by this data field. The base value is multiplied by this to compute the final value. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

Signed.description: Indicates whether this value is signed. Required only by the 'Float' data type.

Type.description: The type of this data field.

DeletedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that deleted this definition. Read only.

DeletedDate.description: A timestamp of when this definition was deleted. Read only.

Description.description: A description of this definition. May not be updated.

DurationAccuracy.description: The number of bits used for timestamp verification. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

DurationAmount.description: The amount of duration for the specified duration unit used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 1. May not be updated.

DurationUnits.description: The units of duration used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 'Days'. May not be updated.

HashLength.description: The bit length of the hash data which will be used for the authorization code. Defaults to 20. May not be updated.

ID.description: The ID of the authorization code definition. Read only.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether this definition is enabled. True if generating codes is disabled.

Name.description: The name of the authorization code definition. May not be updated.

RandomLength.description: The bit length of random data which will be included in the authorization code.  This is necessary to allow creation of "identical" authorization codes containing the same timestamp. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

ValidationFields.description: The defined fields to verify when reading authorization codes generated from this definition. May not be updated.

Type.description: The type for this validation field.

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

AvailableSubscriptions.description: The available subscriptions for this update group.

Attribute.description: The inventory attribute (from the InventoryPackage) used to determine what version of this package type is installed.

Category.description: The inventory category (from the InventoryPackage) used to determine what version of this package type is installed.

Description.description: The description of the package type

Icon.description: Optional.  The icon to use for the PackageType, in base 64

InventoryFrequency.description: The number of minutes to wait before requesting another inventory.  The default value is 1440 (24 hours).

InventoryPackage.description: The inventory package used to determine what version of this package type is installed.

LocalizedDescription.description: Optional. The StringID used to localize the description of the PackageType

LocalizedName.description: Optional. The StringID used to localize the name of the PackageType

MaxDeltaPackages.description: The maximum number of "chained" delta packages to use when updating the client

PackageTypeID.description: Read Only. The package type id.

Description.description: The description of the update group

InventoryFrequency.description: The time in minutes between inventory checks. Default value is 1440 minutes (one day).

InventoryPackage.description: The Package ID of the package used for inventory

LocalizedDescription.description: Optional. The StringID used to localize the description of the update group

LocalizedName.description: Optional. The StringID used to localize the name of the update group

Priority.description: The execution priority of the package relative to other packages in the bundle. Range 1 - 100, lower value indication higher priority.

ReportField.description:
A field to return in the status report for this update group.
            Specify the field with the format [Label]: {[InventoryPackageID].[Category].[Attribute]}.  (i.e. example: {bec778ca-278d-424a-867a-4653a1a19e86.MyCategory.MyAttribute})

ValidatingField.description:
A field used for validation in the status report for this update group.
            Specify the field with the format [Label]: {[InventoryPackageID].[Category].[Attribute]}.  (i.e. example: {bec778ca-278d-424a-867a-4653a1a19e86.MyCategory.MyAttribute})

ValueToValidate.description: The value to validate the ValidationField against.

Version.description: The version of the UpdateGroup, this value is incremented with each modification to a related Bundle or PackageType

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

AttributeTemplate.description: A template for the Attribute from which to read the version of the package installed. The following placeholders are valid: {ContentDefinitionType}, {ContentDefinitionID}, {ContentDefinitionName}

BuildDefinitionID.description: The ID of the Azure DevOps Build Definition for which to create a Build. Either 'BuildDefinitionID' or 'JobID' is required.

CategoryTemplate.description: A template for the category from which to read the version of the package installed. The following placeholders are valid: {ContentDefinitionType}, {ContentDefinitionID}, {ContentDefinitionName}

Description.description: A description for the Content Submission Type

Enabled.description: Indicates whether this submission type is available to be used

ID.description: The ID of the Content Submission Type

InventoryPackageID.description: The ID of the Inventory Package from which to read the version of the package installed.

JobID.description: The ID of the JobDefinition for which to initiate a Job. A value of '0' will cause a submission to fail. Either 'BuildDefinitionID' or 'JobID' is required.

Name.description: The Name of the Content Submission Type

ReleaseNotesDescription.description: A description of how release notes for this Content Submission Type are used

get.description:
Gets a collection of ContentSubmissions. When successful, the response is a PagedResponse of ContentSubmissions. Additional searches: attributes[Name]=Value. This can be used to search for submissions that have the specified values for attributes. Beginning and ending wildcard (*) supported for value.
            If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

parameters.description: Optional. The page limit.  If not specified, the default page limit is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Optional. The page offset.  If not specified, the default page offset is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Optional. Filter by UserID.
parameters.name: userID

parameters.description: Optional. Filter by ContentDefinitionID
parameters.name: contentDefinitionID

parameters.description: Names of Attributes to include when retrieving this submission. This should be a comma-separated list. If not provided, Attributes are not included. If '*', all Attributes are included.
parameters.name: includeAttributes

parameters.description: Optional. Filter the submissions by whether they are part of the Release with the specified Release ID.
parameters.name: releaseID

parameters.description: Optional. Filter submissions by their ContentDefinition's Type ID.
parameters.name: typeID

parameters.description: Optional. Filter submissions by their Version.
parameters.name: version

parameters.description: Optional. If true, includes the ContentDefinition for each submission.
parameters.name: includeDefinition

schema.description: A response containing a page of results and metadata concerning the results

items.description: The definition of the content for submission

ContentSubmissionID.description: The ID of the content submission to which this attribute belongs.

BuildID.description: ReadOnly. The ID of the Azure DevOps Build which will build the content package.

ContentDefinitionID.description: The ID of the Content Definition.

ContentSubmissionID.description: The ID of this Content Submission.

Definition.description: The definition of the content for submission

items.description: An attribute of a definition of the content for submission

ContentDefinitionID.description: The ID of the content definition to which this attribute belongs.
The ID of this content definition.

Description.description: The description used on the package type in the AGCO Update System

Name.description: The name of this content. Name must be valid for Attribute on PackageType.

PackageTypeID.description: Read Only. The ID of the package type used for this content.

JobRunID.description: ReadOnly. The ID of the JobRun which will build the content package.

PackageID.description: The ID of package generated by this content submission.

Repository.description: The SVN repository used as the source of this content submission

Revision.description: The SVN revision used as the source of this content submission.

SubmissionDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time the content submission was made.

UserID.description: Read Only. The ID of the user who submitted the content

Version.description:
Optional.  The version number assigned to this Content Submission and the resulting Package.
            If not provided, version shall be 1 if it is the first content submission for the 
            ContentDefinitionID otherwise it shall be the highest content submission version for the
            specified ContentDefinitionID incremented by 1.

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

post.description:
Creates a ContentSubmission.  The body of the POST is the ContentSubmission to create.
            The ContentSubmissionID will be assigned on creation of the Job.  When successful, the response
            is the ContentSubmissionID.  If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

put.description:
Update the metadata for a file. Size may not be modified by the client. 
                Set status to 'Available' to publish a file. The file must be uploaded.
                Set status to 'Created' to reset a file's contents and re-upload. 
                A file may only be 'Removed' by the DELETE method.

                Set status to 'Available' to publish an image. Both the image and thumbnail must be uploaded.
                Set status to 'Created' to reset an image's contents and re-upload. 
                A file may only be 'Removed' by the DELETE method.

schema.description: A response containing a page of results and metadata concerning the results

Description.description: The description of the update group

InventoryFrequency.description: The time in minutes between inventory checks. Default value is 1440 minutes (one day).

InventoryPackage.description: The Package ID of the package used for inventory

LocalizedDescription.description: Optional. The StringID used to localize the description of the update group

LocalizedName.description: Optional. The StringID used to localize the name of the update group

Priority.description: The execution priority of the package relative to other packages in the bundle. Range 1 - 100, lower value indication higher priority.

ReportField.description:
A field to return in the status report for this update group.
            Specify the field with the format [Label]: {[InventoryPackageID].[Category].[Attribute]}.  (i.e. example: {bec778ca-278d-424a-867a-4653a1a19e86.MyCategory.MyAttribute})

ValidatingField.description:
A field used for validation in the status report for this update group.
            Specify the field with the format [Label]: {[InventoryPackageID].[Category].[Attribute]}.  (i.e. example: {bec778ca-278d-424a-867a-4653a1a19e86.MyCategory.MyAttribute})

ValueToValidate.description: The value to validate the ValidationField against.

Version.description: The version of the UpdateGroup, this value is incremented with each modification to a related Bundle or PackageType

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

ID.description: The id of the voucher history item

ModifiedBy.description: Read-Only. The user that made the last modification to the voucher.

OrderNumber.description: The order number of a commercial license. Required for Commercial Vouchers. Not supported for other Vouchers.

Punched.description: True if voucher has aleady been used.  False if the voucher has not been used.

PunchedDate.description: Read-Only. The date the voucher was punched.

Purpose.description: Required for Internal Vouchers

Type.description: The type of voucher.

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

get.summary: Get a voucher's history.

get.description:
Gets a collection of Activities. When successful, the response is a PagedResponse of Activities.  
            If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

parameters.description: Optional. The page limit.  If not specified, the default page limit is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Optional. The page offset.  If not specified, the default page offset is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Does it include deleted activity, or not
parameters.name: isIncludeDeleted

schema.description: A response containing a page of results and metadata concerning the results

ActivityID.description: The ID of the activity

Type.description: The data type of the parameter

Steps.description: The steps which are performed for this activity

ActivityID.description: The id of the activity this activity step belongs to

ActivityStepID.description: The id of this activity step

ImplementationID.description: The implementation id which is used to look up the step implementation

ParameterMappings.description: The mapping of values from a source to be used for the step parameters

Name.description: The name of the parameter this mapping applies to

Source.description: The source of the value.  The meaning of this value is determined by the source type.  When the source type is “Constant” then source is the value formatted as a string.  When the source type is “Variable” then the source is the name of the variable

SourceType.description: The source type used for supplying the parameter

RunOrder.description: The order of this activity step relative to other activity steps

UseConfig.description: Indicates the configuration for the ActivityStep to use at runtime.  The build agent must provide this configuration

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

            on creation of the Activity.  When successful, the response is the ActivityID.  If unsuccessful, an 
            appropriate ApiError is returned.

get.description:
Gets a collection of ActivityRuns. When successful, the response is a PagedResponse of ActivityRuns.  
            If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

parameters.description: Optional. The page limit.  If not specified, the default page limit is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Optional. The page offset.  If not specified, the default page offset is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description:
Optional. Filter activity runs by status.  Value should be a comma separated list of status to include.
            If not specified, the default status filter is “InProgress”.
parameters.name: status

schema.description: A response containing a page of results and metadata concerning the results

EndDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time when the activity completed

JobActivityID.description: Read Only. The ID of the Job Activity that defines this activity run

JobRunID.description: Read Only. The ID of the JobRun under which this ActivityRun is executing

Parameters.description: The parameters used for this run of the activity.  Parameters cannot be added or removed, but output parameter values may be updated.

Name.description: The name of the parameter this value is for

Value.description: The parameter value in string representation

StartDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time when the activity started

CurrentStep.description: The activity step currently executing, indicated by numeric order

StepProgress.description: The percent progress from the currently executing step.  This value shall be null if progress is not available

StepStatus.description: The status text from the currently executing step

Steps.description: Read Only. The steps to be executed for the activity.  These steps come from the relationship through JobActivity down to ActivityStep

ActivityID.description: The id of the activity this activity step belongs to

ActivityStepID.description: The id of this activity step

ImplementationID.description: The implementation id which is used to look up the step implementation

ParameterMappings.description: The mapping of values from a source to be used for the step parameters

Name.description: The name of the parameter this mapping applies to

Source.description: The source of the value.  The meaning of this value is determined by the source type.  When the source type is “Constant” then source is the value formatted as a string.  When the source type is “Variable” then the source is the name of the variable

SourceType.description: The source type used for supplying the parameter

RunOrder.description: The order of this activity step relative to other activity steps

UseConfig.description: Indicates the configuration for the ActivityStep to use at runtime.  The build agent must provide this configuration

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

put.description:

            When successful, the response is empty.  If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

parameters.description: The ID of the ActivityRun to update ActivityRunStatus for.
parameters.name: activityRunID

schema.description: A DTO for an IActivityRun

EndDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time when the activity completed

JobActivityID.description: Read Only. The ID of the Job Activity that defines this activity run

JobRunID.description: Read Only. The ID of the JobRun under which this ActivityRun is executing

Parameters.description: The parameters used for this run of the activity.  Parameters cannot be added or removed, but output parameter values may be updated.

Name.description: The name of the parameter this value is for

Value.description: The parameter value in string representation

StartDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time when the activity started

CurrentStep.description: The activity step currently executing, indicated by numeric order

StepProgress.description: The percent progress from the currently executing step.  This value shall be null if progress is not available

StepStatus.description: The status text from the currently executing step

Steps.description: Read Only. The steps to be executed for the activity.  These steps come from the relationship through JobActivity down to ActivityStep

ActivityID.description: The id of the activity this activity step belongs to

ActivityStepID.description: The id of this activity step

ImplementationID.description: The implementation id which is used to look up the step implementation

ParameterMappings.description: The mapping of values from a source to be used for the step parameters

Name.description: The name of the parameter this mapping applies to

Source.description: The source of the value.  The meaning of this value is determined by the source type.  When the source type is “Constant” then source is the value formatted as a string.  When the source type is “Variable” then the source is the name of the variable

SourceType.description: The source type used for supplying the parameter

RunOrder.description: The order of this activity step relative to other activity steps

UseConfig.description: Indicates the configuration for the ActivityStep to use at runtime.  The build agent must provide this configuration

get.description:
Gets a collection of Agents. When successful, the response is a PagedResponse of Agents.  
            If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

parameters.description: Optional. The page limit.  If not specified, the default page limit is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Optional. The page offset.  If not specified, the default page offset is 0.
parameters.name: offset

schema.description: A response containing a page of results and metadata concerning the results

KeepAliveInterval.description: The 'Heartbeat Interval' used by the Build Agent.

MachineName.description: The machine name of the computer the agent is running on

LastStatusUpdate.description: ReadOnly. The UTC date and time of the last status update

Online.description: Indicates if the agent is online

Configurations.description: The configuration names supported.  The configurations collection is empty for steps which do not require configuration.

StepImplementationID.description: The Implementation ID of the step this configuration is for

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

get.description:
Gets the activity run assigned to an agent.  When successful, the response is the ActivityRun
            assigned to the Agent.  If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.

parameters.description: The id of the Agent to get.
parameters.name: agentID

schema.description: A DTO for an IActivityRun

EndDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time when the activity completed

JobActivityID.description: Read Only. The ID of the Job Activity that defines this activity run

JobRunID.description: Read Only. The ID of the JobRun under which this ActivityRun is executing

Parameters.description: The parameters used for this run of the activity.  Parameters cannot be added or removed, but output parameter values may be updated.

Name.description: The name of the parameter this value is for

Value.description: The parameter value in string representation

StartDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time when the activity started

CurrentStep.description: The activity step currently executing, indicated by numeric order

StepProgress.description: The percent progress from the currently executing step.  This value shall be null if progress is not available

StepStatus.description: The status text from the currently executing step

Steps.description: Read Only. The steps to be executed for the activity.  These steps come from the relationship through JobActivity down to ActivityStep

ActivityID.description: The id of the activity this activity step belongs to

ActivityStepID.description: The id of this activity step

ImplementationID.description: The implementation id which is used to look up the step implementation

ParameterMappings.description: The mapping of values from a source to be used for the step parameters

Name.description: The name of the parameter this mapping applies to

Source.description: The source of the value.  The meaning of this value is determined by the source type.  When the source type is “Constant” then source is the value formatted as a string.  When the source type is “Variable” then the source is the name of the variable

SourceType.description: The source type used for supplying the parameter

RunOrder.description: The order of this activity step relative to other activity steps

UseConfig.description: Indicates the configuration for the ActivityStep to use at runtime.  The build agent must provide this configuration

Value.description: The parameter value in string representation

StartDate.description: Read Only. The UTC date and time when the activity started

CurrentStep.description: The activity step currently executing, indicated by numeric order

StepProgress.description: The percent progress from the currently executing step.  This value shall be null if progress is not available

StepStatus.description: The status text from the currently executing step

Steps.description: Read Only. The steps to be executed for the activity.  These steps come from the relationship through JobActivity down to ActivityStep

ActivityID.description: The id of the activity this activity step belongs to

ActivityStepID.description: The id of this activity step

ImplementationID.description: The implementation id which is used to look up the step implementation

ParameterMappings.description: The mapping of values from a source to be used for the step parameters

Name.description: The name of the parameter this mapping applies to

Source.description: The source of the value.  The meaning of this value is determined by the source type.  When the source type is “Constant” then source is the value formatted as a string.  When the source type is “Variable” then the source is the name of the variable

SourceType.description: The source type used for supplying the parameter

RunOrder.description: The order of this activity step relative to other activity steps

UseConfig.description: Indicates the configuration for the ActivityStep to use at runtime.  The build agent must provide this configuration

EndDate.description: The UTC date and time when the job completed

Creates a Job.  The body of the POST is the Job to create.  The JobID will be assigned on
            creation of the Job.  When successful, the response is the JobID.  If unsuccessful, an 
            appropriate ApiError is returned.

get.description:
Gets a collection of Steps. When successful, the response is a PagedResponse of Steps.
            If unsuccessful, an appropriate ApiError is returned.  Steps.Read permission is required.

parameters.description: Optional. The page limit.  If not specified, the default page limit is 10.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Optional. The page offset.  If not specified, the default page offset is 0.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Does it include deleted step, or not
parameters.name: includeDeleted

schema.description: A response containing a page of results and metadata concerning the results

ConfigRequired.description: Indicates if the step requires configuration values to be provided by the build agent

Deleted.description: Read Only.  Indicates if the record is deleted.

Description.description: A description of the step to be presented to a user

ImplementationID.description: The implementation ID used to lookup the step implementation when it is executed

Type.description: The data type of the parameter

Limit.description: The number of entities this paged response is limited to.

Offset.description: The number of entities prior to this page of items.

TotalCount.description: The total number of entities matching the request.

schema.description: Represents the model used to define how a type of authorization code is generated.

AuthorizationID.description: The value used for securing codes generated.

CreatedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that created this definition. Read only.

CreatedDate.description: A timestamp of when this definition was created. Read only.

DataFields.description: The defined fields to include in authorization codes generated from this definition. May not be updated.

DigitsPrecision.description: The number of decimal digits to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. Must be in range 1 - 15.

MaxExponent.description: The maximum exponent to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. May not be greater than 307.

MaxValue.description: The maximum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

MinExponent.description: The minimum exponent to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. May not be less than -292.

MinValue.description: The minimum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

ScaleFactor.description: The resolution of values that can be represented by this data field. The base value is multiplied by this to compute the final value. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

Signed.description: Indicates whether this value is signed. Required only by the 'Float' data type.

Type.description: The type of this data field.

DeletedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that deleted this definition. Read only.

DeletedDate.description: A timestamp of when this definition was deleted. Read only.

Description.description: A description of this definition. May not be updated.

DurationAccuracy.description: The number of bits used for timestamp verification. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

DurationAmount.description: The amount of duration for the specified duration unit used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 1. May not be updated.

DurationUnits.description: The units of duration used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 'Days'. May not be updated.

HashLength.description: The bit length of the hash data which will be used for the authorization code. Defaults to 20. May not be updated.

ID.description: The ID of the authorization code definition. Read only.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether this definition is enabled. True if generating codes is disabled.

Name.description: The name of the authorization code definition. May not be updated.

RandomLength.description: The bit length of random data which will be included in the authorization code.  This is necessary to allow creation of "identical" authorization codes containing the same timestamp. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

ValidationFields.description: The defined fields to verify when reading authorization codes generated from this definition. May not be updated.

Type.description: The type for this validation field.

MaxValue.description: The maximum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

MinExponent.description: The minimum exponent to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. May not be less than -292.

MinValue.description: The minimum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

ScaleFactor.description: The resolution of values that can be represented by this data field. The base value is multiplied by this to compute the final value. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

Signed.description: Indicates whether this value is signed. Required only by the 'Float' data type.

Type.description: The type of this data field.

DeletedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that deleted this definition. Read only.

DeletedDate.description: A timestamp of when this definition was deleted. Read only.

Description.description: A description of this definition. May not be updated.

DurationAccuracy.description: The number of bits used for timestamp verification. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

DurationAmount.description: The amount of duration for the specified duration unit used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 1. May not be updated.

DurationUnits.description: The units of duration used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 'Days'. May not be updated.

HashLength.description: The bit length of the hash data which will be used for the authorization code. Defaults to 20. May not be updated.

ID.description: The ID of the authorization code definition. Read only.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether this definition is enabled. True if generating codes is disabled.

Name.description: The name of the authorization code definition. May not be updated.

RandomLength.description: The bit length of random data which will be included in the authorization code.  This is necessary to allow creation of "identical" authorization codes containing the same timestamp. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

ValidationFields.description: The defined fields to verify when reading authorization codes generated from this definition. May not be updated.

Type.description: The type for this validation field.

AuthorizationCodes.Shared.Models.Authori.description: Represents the model used to define how a type of authorization code is generated.

AuthorizationID.description: The value used for securing codes generated.

CreatedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that created this definition. Read only.

CreatedDate.description: A timestamp of when this definition was created. Read only.

DataFields.description: The defined fields to include in authorization codes generated from this definition. May not be updated.

DigitsPrecision.description: The number of decimal digits to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. Must be in range 1 - 15.

MaxExponent.description: The maximum exponent to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. May not be greater than 307.

MaxValue.description: The maximum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

MinExponent.description: The minimum exponent to be used by this data field. Required only by the 'Float' data type. May not be less than -292.

MinValue.description: The minimum value that can be represented by this data field. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

ScaleFactor.description: The resolution of values that can be represented by this data field. The base value is multiplied by this to compute the final value. Required only by the 'Decimal' data type.

Signed.description: Indicates whether this value is signed. Required only by the 'Float' data type.

Type.description: The type of this data field.

DeletedByUserID.description: The ID of the user that deleted this definition. Read only.

DeletedDate.description: A timestamp of when this definition was deleted. Read only.

Description.description: A description of this definition. May not be updated.

DurationAccuracy.description: The number of bits used for timestamp verification. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

DurationAmount.description: The amount of duration for the specified duration unit used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 1. May not be updated.

DurationUnits.description: The units of duration used to calculate the Authorization Code. Defaults to 'Days'. May not be updated.

HashLength.description: The bit length of the hash data which will be used for the authorization code. Defaults to 20. May not be updated.

ID.description: The ID of the authorization code definition. Read only.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether this definition is enabled. True if generating codes is disabled.

Name.description: The name of the authorization code definition. May not be updated.

RandomLength.description: The bit length of random data which will be included in the authorization code.  This is necessary to allow creation of "identical" authorization codes containing the same timestamp. Defaults to 5. May not be updated.

ValidationFields.description: The defined fields to verify when reading authorization codes generated from this definition. May not be updated.

Type.description: The type for this validation field.

DealerCode.description: Dealer code that relates to the dealership. Minimum length of 3 characters.

Dealership.description: Name of dealership. Minimum length of 3 characters.

DefinitionName.description: The name of the definition used for generating this authorization code. Read Only.

Notes.description: Optional notes used for internal use.
